column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Really nostalgic pizzaria with an authentic Chicagoean allure... And AWESOME deep dish! Â I didn't know what quite to expect coming into this local joint
column4: and legend were all true. I had the house fav
column6: it did not disappoint. I am no expert on deep dish pizza
column7: but the Lou was probably the best I've ever had. Only complaint I have is the weak beer selection.... But the food and culture more than made up for it's beer-related short-comings.
